about.description:
The LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the shared-object libraries needed to run
applications that use the LAL MetaIO library.  If you want to install
the Python bindings, please install the associated python-lalmetaio
package.

name: lalmetaio
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "lalmetaio" %}
{% set version = "1.6.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "8b33a98343a40841f5da12b0b0d3df941654800e7e84f11be1db3a6f0e404412" %}

# dependencies
{% set lal_version = "7.0.0" %}
{% set swig_version = "3.0.9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  error_overlinking: true
  error_overdepending: true
  number: 1
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - make
    - pkg-config >=0.18.0
    - swig >={{ swig_version }}
  host:
    - lal >={{ lal_version }}
    - metaio
  run:
    - lal >={{ lal_version }}
    - metaio
test:
  requires:
    - pkg-config  # [unix]
  commands:
    - lalmetaio_version --verbose
    - test "$(pkg-config --modversion ${PKG_NAME})" == "${PKG_VERSION}"  # [unix]

outputs:
  - name: lalmetaio
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("lalmetaio", max_pin="x") }}

  - name: python-lalmetaio
    script: install-python.sh
    build:
      error_overlinking: true
      error_overdepending: true
      ignore_run_exports:
        - python
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - make
        - pkg-config >=0.18.0
        - swig >={{ swig_version }}
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('lalmetaio', exact=True) }}
        - numpy
        - python
      run:
        - lal
        - {{ pin_subpackage('lalmetaio', exact=True) }}
        - metaio  # [linux]
        - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
        - python
        - python-lal >={{ lal_version }}
    test:
      imports:
        - lalmetaio
      requires:
        - pytest >=4.0.0a0
      source_files:
        - test/python
      commands:
        - pushd test/python; python -m pytest -v; popd
    about:
      home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
      doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalmetaio/
      dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/
      license: GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_family: GPL
      license_file: COPYING
      summary: LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library
      description: |
        The LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
        This package contains the python bindings.

about:
  home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
  doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalmetaio/
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library
  description: |
    The LSC Algorithm MetaIO Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
    This package contains the shared-object libraries needed to run
    applications that use the LAL MetaIO library.  If you want to install
    the Python bindings, please install the associated python-lalmetaio
    package.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - skymoo
